reviews.review:
Portal 2 didn't include puzzles that in Portal 1.
So get this too.

-الجيمبلاي 

مش محتاج أتكلم عن الجيمبلاي المصقول بدقة ، اللعبة من تطوير أحد أفضل الاستوديوهات في تاريخ الصناعة ، باختصار وبكلمة واحدة شيء متعوب عليه

-القصة

القصة ولا أروع ، كل ما تلعب اللعبة اكتر كل ما هتكتشف أشياء سرية ومعلومات هتفهمها أكتر عن القصة ، اللعبة فيها قيمة إعادة اللعب بشكل مجنون ! 

-السلبيات

1-قصر مدة اللعب 3 ساعات فقط!
传送门，不多说，玩儿就完事儿
Best puzzle game out there after Portal 2
if you like puzzle games with a story then get this
Though not as good as its sequel Portal 2, this game presents a real breakthrough in gaming. I really enjoyed playing it a second time with the creators' commentaries on the development process.
I can beat the game in 45 mins but its still fun every time
great  game i'd definetly replay this another time
es un buen juego para pasar el rato y tiene una historia exelente.

Primeiramente recomendo comprar este jogo em promoção, paguei 3 reais no portal 1 e 2, e confesso que foram os 3 reais mais bem gastos da minha vida, falo isso pois apesar de sr um jogo maravilhoso é extremamente curto, como podem ver zerei ele em 3 horas (e olha que sou muito burro e ruim) ótimos gráficos que continuam bons até hoje, trilha sonora gostosinha de se ouvir, história até que é intrigante, e gameplay divertida, tendo uma junção de raciocínio para os puzzles e um pouco de habilidade para resolve-los de forma correta
nota: 8,7
Really fun and quite challenging, however, you should get this game with portal 2 and play them both!
Portal is an epic game. For fucks sake please get it. It is hella cheap and actually makes you smarter, you dumbass.
This game was amazing and had a great and compelling story line, from it's problem solving, to the sarcastic comedy, there is nothing hate about this game.
Отличная игра ! Короткая, но очень интересная)))
An extremely quick game to finish. It's quite easy too.
It's super good I mean come on it's Portal
Muito bom mas curto, recomendo para as pessoas que querem ter a experiência Portal pela primeira vez.
Это Portal Не игра а демо, для  игры Portal 2 самая Крутая играя
Muito divertido, mesmo depois de tanto tempo do lançamento.

Oyun iyi.İlk başta 19 bölüm var onları geçiyoruz sonra(SPOILER) bizi öldürmeye çalışıyor biri sonra kaçmaya çalışıyoruz.Benim oynadığım yere kadar böyle.Oyun aslında baya iyi.Orange Box ile geldi bana ve eğlenceli oyun.
不错，第一次玩这个第一代传送门，三个小时通关，很棒，片尾曲也好听
aunque he instalado primero Portal 2 lo considero uno de mis mejores juegos junto a otros mas yo recomiendo este juego y la segunda parte tambien
Couldn't get past the fire pit, anyone know how?
好玩，有时费脑子，但很不错，三小时完成
Хорошая игра но короткая по сравнению со 2 частью
Fantastisches Rätselspiel mit grossartig-schrägem Humor :-D Relativ kurz aber sehr unterhaltsam. Nicht zu schwer, aber dennoch steht man immer wieder vor kniffligen Aufgaben.

Душевно, но слишком мало.

Пойду проходить 2 часть, ХЕХЕХХЕХ

Игра реально афигенная!!! Крутая концовка! Проходится часа за 3-4 но принесет кучу положительных эмоций! Удачи всем кто будет играть и не бомбите пока не дойдёте до 18 камеры испытаний или до уровней победы... (там пи***ц) Всем советую не смотря на то что игра 2010 года...
Hab erst 55 Minuten, bis jetzt nice.

По факту просто трилогия портала, если выбирать между 1 и 2 частью (стоят одинаково на стиме), то конечно яб выбрал 2 часть. Но если вы фанат трилогии портала то рекамендую к покупке. А если говорить о простой покупке то не рекамендую, устаревшая графика, звуки устаревшие, на скринах выгледит лучше чем на самом деле. Сюжета мало. Русской озвучки не ту. Я фанат портала 2 (у меня 50 часов в портале 2), но портал как-то не зашол.
游戏真心经典，先玩的第二代后玩的第一代丝毫没有感觉到任何倒退，只是惊叹于v社的大脑洞，非常有趣。另外没有双人合作有点可惜。最后想吐槽一下片尾曲的汉化。。一直以来对古风翻译不是很感冒，再让GLaDOS唱出来就更违和了，而且为什么要把即使你将我推进焚化炉要翻译成亦或将我推进火炕？？？炕？？？你们在炕上干了什么？！

이 게임 재밌음
멀미만 참을 수 있으면

Short but sweet. This game is a classic. If you are new to PC gaming and haven't had a chance to play any of Valves games, I recommend you start with the Portal series. They are great at introducing you to keyboard and mouse controls.

This is my favorite game(duo) of all time. it doesn't have the best graphics or the most exciting storyline, but the gameplay is so fun and i always find myself coming back to it every 2 or 3 years to put in another play-through. its just delightful, sarcastic humor from a petty robot and I love every second of it. Plus, if you like sarcastic/satire humor, this game will have one of the most rewarding endings you've ever seen. (same goes for the second game!)

Too bad Valve cant count to 3 but until then..

This game is pure genius.  You haven't seen more innovation since haufmann made acid.

11/10
Very short but good game. Get with a discount.
A real gem of gaming. It is innovative, fun, and story rich in a surprisingly short amount of playtime.
Amazing story telling. I love the neat puzzles and look forward to buying the second. :))
Quirky funny gameplay. interesting puzzle solving
Really fun game, highly recommend both Portal 1 and 2.
Don't trust the flying beaver in the water level. Just a tip.

Even after all these years Portal is my go to game to recommend to new gamers and old gamers alike. The pacing is perfect and the gameplay is easy to pick up but consistently challenging. The story is interesting and amazingly voice acted.  Its a 10/10 game for me.
it is very fun and has a better story in the second one according to my friend.

[h1]Несложная головоломка от Valve.[/h1]
[i]Получил, купив "The Orange Box" с Half-Life 2.[/i]
  В этой игре мне понравилось всё, хороший сюжет, интересные головоломки, турели, "Ахахах, я сам себя вижу" и т.п. Для меня серия игр Portal намного интереснее Half-life.
  Valve проделали большую работу и сделали офигенную игру.
 Моя оценка✓: [b] 10 из 10. [/b]
Всем рекомендую пройти!

Even though my hours look as if i have little time on this game, i have sunk many sessions into this game to just play.
Portal, and portal 2 alike are fun short puzzle games. Portal is just a great valve game, just don't expect a portal 3 anytime soon.
el juego es increible con respecto a la historia y seguro me compre portal 2 para continuar con la increible historia
OH MY GOSH!!! I JUST COMPLETED THIS AND I AM ABOUT TO START THE SECOND ONE (I GOT THE BUNDLE)!!!!! THIS GAME IS A MUST PLAY!!!!!!!!
